document_data.mainbody:
alaglavur Street was a street in Khôltar, the Iron City, circa the Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR.
This cobblestone street began at Hael Way just a short walk east-southeast of Dubrinlar, the western gate through the walls of Khôltar. On the western corner was Vandanamers, a noisy and popular luthdren (restaurant). On the eastern corner was another loud establishment, Krosturs Forge. Opposite the mouth of Galaglavur Street, the view was mostly of the back side of Manycoins Hall. Galaglavur ran off in a southerly direction from Hael Way.
